channel.title: News on CityU Wang Lab
channel.description: Recent content in News on CityU Wang Lab

item.title: News of our lab
item.description: 2019 · 2019.09 Dr. Wang was invited to give a talk in ‘The 3rd international symposium on the frontiers of stress medicine’ in Chengdu, Sichuan, China. · 2019.09 New members: Rayna joined our group as a joint PhD student in June! Han Guiyuan, He Linli, Lai Yuni and Wu Tan joined our group as new PhD students in September! · 2019.08 Cao Yi, Qi Lin and Zhang Yuchen Zhu attended ‘3rd Croucher Summer Course in Advanced Imaging 2019’ in HongKong University!
